page.title: 16FAMILY LIFE ROUND THORNTON.
page.content: In and around Thornton there are about twenty_five houses, excluding farm residences. In the area,{families }are very isolated as there is nowhere to meet. For young families, there is a Mother and Toddlers group in Thornborough. Shopping is a difficulty with young children as the nearest shops are in Buckingham, which is five miles away, as are the police station and health facilities. With older children the parents find that they have to transport them everywhere as there is no{public transport}in the area. Most people travel out of Thornton to work. In their spare time, the villagers enjoy{gardening}and{sports. An annual event is Thorton College Fete where the villagers meet.
